channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22518] SQLStdHiveAuthorizerFactoryForTest doesn't work correctly for llap tests
item.summary: SQLStdHiveAuthorizerFactoryForTest doesn't work correctly for llap tests

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
abstractdog could you please take a look?
actually...why the test didn't worked as it supposed to was a missing hiveconf setting for the llap specific xml

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12990876/HIVE-22518.01.patch
